Text: Re Pray Harderwhats his new job table cloth ironer Kennison turned out to be a real disaster Im beginning to think that many of our recent free agents are turning out to be other teams trash I guess the Tractor Traylor is not washed up and hes a big reason why Chicago has turned it around Though he did get on Shannys bad side during Pryces holdout with some things he said We used to have this guy named Shannon Sharpe Hes pretty good too If only i could say fuck it all and just go skiing but its been degrees here for weeks Its time Shanny hires me to help him out Original Message From To Sent Thursday November AM Subject RE Pray Harder i didnt hear about forseberg until i heard about kennison woody paige had a good article on the th about him quitting and all the shit he has been given peder is about to be replaced as and usher Original Message From Merlin Maley ENRON Sent Wednesday November PM To Lenhart Matthew Subject Re Pray Harder where have you been Hes taking some time away from hockey Most suspect hell either be back soon so he can play in the Olympics for team Sweden or he just might take the whole year off His body is beat up bad from the last several years Who knows he might pull a Barry Sanders and walk away at the top of his game I told you Peder was missing Original Message From To Sent Wednesday November PM Subject RE Pray Harder did forseberg quit Original Message From Merlin Maley ENRON Sent Friday November AM To Lenhart Matthew Subject Re Pray Harder peders email address no longer works its disconnected i think it might be osama bin peder he disappeared right after this thing happened and he and i were talking about this sort thing in vegas right before it happened maybe we should find him get him drunk with his pants around his ankles and put him in on the broncos defensive line he defeinately couldnt do any worse big gas is blowing itself up huh go figure take your energy business knowledge and get involved with the alternative energies solar hydrogen wind its time to move away from the dependance on oil we still need it just not as much thats my liberal environmental eduacation talking happy friday merlin Original Message From To Sent Thursday November PM Subject RE Pray Harder not much is going on here enron is on full melt down i think the company is about to go under due to fraud with our upper management it is one of the largest collapses in american business broncos suck i couldnt take watching that game on mon the defense is miserable how can they be worse than they were last year i sent peder an email today bc jen and max cannot get in touch with him how is school i am going to have to go back bc i will be out of a job soon are you ready for miami Original Message From Merlin Maley ENRON Sent Thursday November PM To Lenhart Matthew Subject Pray Harder hey man what the fuck is going on with the broncos the defense is terrible the offense is mediocre at best and our onle real hope on special teams is out with a screwed up ankle the raiders beat us at our own game gruden has had a lot of time to study shannys offensive system rhodes defense looks exactly like robinsons lets blitz everyone on every play which works well if you get to the qb but fails otherwise i thought it might be that they just havent had time to jell but im really starting to wonder about that and where the fuck is peder hes disappeared hopefully td is back for good he was the only good thing to come out of monday night td return us to the promised land or bring back THE MAN everyones coming out of retirement these days so what else is going on merls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s
